## Animals Over People
<hr>

<p>I’ve always loved being around animals—whether volunteering at sanctuaries, fostering pets, or exploring wildlife in nature. This section captures some of the moments that reflect that passion.</p>

## Gardening

<hr>

<p>Gardening has been a hands-on way for me to learn about soil health, native plants, and sustainable practices—especially through my work with the church and the DWP.</p>

## Collaborating with the Community

<hr>

<p>I’ve had the privilege to learn from and work alongside members of the Chumash community. This experience helped me better understand Indigenous stewardship, traditional ecological knowledge, and cultural history.</p>
